description.value:
Prerequisite(s): Two Brutal Crocodile Maneuvers
Range: Melee
Target: One Creature
Duration: Initiated grapple

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Strike) Crippling your foe's muscles, you seize hold of your opponent and begin to compact them within your coils. Make an attack against a creature using a discipline weapon. On a successful hit, you initiate a grapple with the target while dealing [[1d4]] points of strength damage and [[8d6]] points of damage. You deal [[8d6]] points of damage each round that you successfully maintain the grapple (this stacks with any damage you may deal with constrict).
